name: "Lethal Weapon" - The Pilot Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: The show opened in El Paso, Texas as which officer was involved in a car chase?
questions.explanation:
Martin Riggs.

	His wife called him while he was driving a pickup with police lights added on. He was being shot at, but his wife told him she was about to give birth. He stopped the pursuit and instead used a sniper rifle to take out the criminals. At the same moment his wife and unborn child were killed in a car accident.

questions.text: The television series picks up after the fourth movie in the franchise.
questions.explanation:
False.

	The series, while using the same name, is a complete retelling of the story. It picks up before Martin Riggs and Roger Murtaugh were paired together. Damon Wayans played Murtaugh in the show while Clayne Crawford took on the role of Riggs. The roles were originally played by Danny Glover and Mel Gibson in the film franchise.

questions.text: Which of the new partners was recovering from a heart attack?
questions.explanation:
Roger Murtaugh.

	Riggs transferred to the LAPD from Texas after his family died. Murtaugh was already in Los Angeles, but recovering from a heart attack. They ended up being partnered the day Riggs transferred in.

questions.text: What was the first case Murtaugh and Riggs worked together?
questions.explanation:
Bank Robbery.

	They hadn't met yet when they paired up on the scene of the bank robbery. Murtaugh had just been told he was going to be partnered up with Riggs when the call came in. They met at the bank. Riggs, not in a uniform, walked into the bank with three pizzas and used that as a way to get into the bank with the robbers.

questions.text: What was going on when Riggs and Murtaugh were chasing a criminal through the streets?
questions.explanation:
A street race.

	It was a street race with Formula 1 cars. They were using an undercover police car, chasing a criminal in a sports car when they crashed into the course. The rest of the chase has the race cars zooming around them.

questions.text: What did Trish Murtaugh do for a living?
questions.explanation:
Lawyer.

	The police lieutenant made a joke to Roger about his wife making a ton of money keeping criminals out of jail. In the film franchise she was a stay-at-home mother who later turned into a romance novelist. She was played by Keesha Sharp in the series.

questions.text: How did the Mexican man Riggs and Murtaugh were chasing die?
questions.explanation:
Hit by a bus.

	Following a car chase, Murtaugh yelled at the man to stop and put his hands up. The man started to comply, when he was hit by a bus. Capt. Brooks Avery was upset that the duo was down near the docks to begin with, and even more upset that he might have to file manslaughter charges against a bus driver.

questions.text: Oscar Alvarez was killed and set up to look like a suicide. Why?
questions.correct: He stole heroin from drug dealers.
options: He shot the son of a gangster.
He slept with the wife of a City Councman.
He had a terminal disease and wanted to end his life but couldn't do it on his own.
questions.explanation:
He stole heroin from drug dealers.

	It was staged as a suicide, but Riggs refused to believe it. He thought the man deserved an investigation because he had served the country. Because of the investigation they discovered a drug smuggling ring.

questions.text: What TV theme song did Riggs whistle while walking into the Los Angeles Port?
questions.explanation:
The Andy Griffith Show.

	While walking across the parking lot, carrying a machine gun, he whistled the entire theme. He was there to rescue the son of the the murdered Oscar Alvarez. The drug dealers has kidnapped him in order to make the mother return the drugs stolen by her husband.

questions.text: Where was Riggs shot during the closing scene?
questions.explanation:
Left shoulder.

	Riggs and Murtaugh were leaving the port authority warehouse and talking about how they needed to put out an arrest warrant on Daryl Hennicky when Riggs was shot in the shoulder. Murtaugh later in the scene shot Riggs in the left foot as well.
